Foundation of Kalyani

Someshvara I (Ahavamalla) shifted his capital from Manyakheta to Kalyani (Kalyan, Karnataka) and made it a magnificent city.

тЪФя╕П
Chola-Chalukya Wars

His entire life was spent in wars with the Cholas (especially Rajadhiraja and Rajendra II). Although the Chola king Rajadhiraja was killed in the Battle of Koppam, the Cholas ultimately claimed victory. He also faced defeat in the Battle of Kudal-Sangamam. Finally, due to an incurable illness, he took 'Param Yoga' (water samadhi) in the Tungabhadra River.
